articles.title: South Africa-US relations: Government hits out at Trump Afrikaner refugee plan - BBC
articles.description: Reports say the first set of white South Africans could arrive in the US next week.
articles.content:
South Africa has criticised the US as reports emerge suggesting Washington could receive white Afrikaners as refugees as early as next week.
A document seen by the BBC's US partner CBS describes the… [+1669 chars]
